title: Looking for a dozen Turkey Reds
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Looking for a dozen Turkey Reds
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mark
Need Bergen, Kleinow, Pfeister, Sallee, Stahl, Chance, Bescher, Doolan, Konetchy, Smith and Wallace.

Okay, I guess that's only eleven.  Raw or graded, visual appeal is more important than any grade.  Cash available.

posts.post_title: Looking for a dozen Turkey Reds
posts.post_content:
Posted By: jim
Hi Mark, I have a PSA 4 Kleinow and an SGC 40 Bergen. Let me know if you wnat scans, price. Thanks,
jim
